briefTitle: Asthma Clinical Research Network (ACRN) Trial - Long-Acting Beta Agonist Response by Genotype (LARGE)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male or female, ages 18 and older
* Clinical history consistent with asthma
* For subjects regularly using inhaled corticosteroids, FEV1 50% of predicted, methacholine PC20 FEV1 16 mg/ml or 12% and 200 ml, improvement in FEV1 after 2 puffs of inhaled albuterol
* For subjects not regularly using inhaled corticosteroids, FEV1 40% of predicted, methacholine PC20 FEV1 8 mg/ml or 12% and 200 ml, improvement in FEV1 after 2 puffs of inhaled albuterol
* Genotype eligibility (determined during screening)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Smoker (total smoking history must be less than 10 pack years)
* Significant unstable medical condition other than asthma
* History of life-threatening asthma requiring treatment with intubation and mechanical ventilation in the past 10 years
* Pregnant or lactating

outcomeMeasures.title: Morning (AM) Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for AM PEF rate

outcomeMeasures.title: Evening (PM) Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for PM PEF rate

outcomeMeasures.title: Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Variability
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for PEF variability, where PEF variability is defined as 100% x (PM PEF - AM PEF)/(PM PEF)

outcomeMeasures.title: Asthma Symptoms
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for asthma symptoms (0=absent, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe).

outcomeMeasures.title: Rescue Medication (Ipratropium and Albuterol) Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for rescue medication use

outcomeMeasures.title: Spirometry Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1), Pre-bronchodilator
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for Spirometry FEV1, pre-bronchodilator

outcomeMeasures.title: Spirometry Forced Vital Capacity (FVC), Pre-bronchodilator
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for Spirometry FVC, pre-bronchodilator

outcomeMeasures.title: Spirometry Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Rate, Pre-bronchodilator
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for Spirometry PEF rate, pre-bronchodilator

outcomeMeasures.title: Exhaled Nitric Oxide (eNO)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for eNO

outcomeMeasures.title: Exhaled Breath Condensate (EBC)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for EBC

outcomeMeasures.title: Methacholine Provocative Concentration 20 (PC20)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for methacholine PC20

outcomeMeasures.title: Asthma Control Questionnaire (ACQ)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change between placebo salmeterol and active salmeterol for ACQ, where ACQ ranges from 0 (best asthma control) to 6 (worst asthma control).
